title: Organizational Development Practical Competency Strengthening: Sustainable Educational Solution Co-Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more core factors of educational problems using a collaborative design process.
Learners iteratively improve solution prototypes two or more times by applying the Design-Based Research (DBR) methodology.
Learners can utilize a decision-making framework to systematically reconcile conflicting stakeholder requirements.
Learners develop one or more culturally contextualized educational design proposals by analyzing field observation data.

In a VR simulation environment, learners use three sustainability indicators (environmental, social, economic) as evaluation criteria to verify the effectiveness of solutions for two scenarios with 80% or higher accuracy and write a report.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
